name: Self-Portrait in Three Colors
comments: Then don't decide and just go with the rhythm of Jazz Dude.
I can't make up my mind who I love more - Mingus or Monk. Mink? Monkus? What the heck, I'll have them both. This tune is utterly wonderful and so soulful
Very nice piece that gives me very nice peace....oops I accidentally said something mildly clever, I'm sorry...hahahahaha....don't mind me I'm very tired....really nice music here

Chicago Jazz Ensemble doing an entire concert 
tribute to Mingus this coming Friday night...good stuff.
Written Justice, your avatar matches your comment.

This is a lovely little composition but where's the part of the composition that conjures the image of Mingus fucking his band-members up? Hm.
